entities.name: ElizaOS
entities.description: An operating system for AI agents focused on development and cloud integration. It aims to provide a robust platform for building and deploying autonomous agents.

entities.name: Eliza Cloud
entities.description: A cloud platform for deploying and hosting AI agents developed by ElizaOS. It focuses on integration with various cloud providers and enabling AI-assisted agent creation.

entities.name: Railway
entities.description: A cloud deployment platform that allows developers to deploy applications easily. It supports various databases like Postgres and Redis.

entities.name: Phala Cloud
entities.description: A decentralized cloud computing platform that offers confidential computing services. It is used for deploying AI agents and applications.

entities.name: Stripe
entities.description: A financial services and technology company that offers payment processing software and APIs for e-commerce websites and mobile applications. It supports both fiat and crypto payments.

entities.name: x402
entities.description: A payment system integrated with ElizaOS. It likely offers account top-up services and potentially supports cryptocurrency payments.

entities.name: Twitter API
entities.description: An application programming interface provided by Twitter that allows developers to interact with Twitter's data and features. Authentication methods have evolved to use keys.

entities.name: X (Twitter)
entities.description: A social media and microblogging platform. It is used for communication and currently faces issues with its API authentication.

entities.name: Kenk
entities.description: A key individual involved in ElizaOS development, frequently providing clarifications and updates on project status and technical issues.

entities.name: Redis
entities.description: An open-source, in-memory data structure store, used as a database, cache, and message broker. It supports features like job management and queuing.

entities.name: MySQL
entities.description: An open-source relational database management system. It is used within the ElizaOS ecosystem for data storage, and issues related to its support have been addressed.

entities.name: Poink
entities.description: A team that claimed to switch from ElizaOS to another platform, though ElizaOS disputes any prior working relationship. Their product's robustness has been questioned.

entities.name: openserv
entities.description: An alternative platform that a team named Poink claimed to have switched to from ElizaOS. ElizaOS has no record of working with this team.

entities.name: npm
entities.description: A package manager for the JavaScript programming language. ElizaOS plans to package its editor for publishing on npm.

entities.name: WorkOS
entities.description: A platform focused on providing authentication solutions for businesses. It is planned for integration into ElizaOS for authentication purposes.

entities.name: Claude
entities.description: A large language model developed by Anthropic. It is mentioned as a potential cost-saving alternative in the context of AI agent development.

entities.name: Anthropic
entities.description: An artificial intelligence safety and research company. They are known for developing large language models like Claude.

entities.name: USDC
entities.description: A stablecoin cryptocurrency, typically pegged to the US dollar. It is mentioned in the context of payment options alongside fiat currency.

entities.name: Postgres
entities.description: An open-source relational database system known for its reliability and feature robustness. It is used in cloud deployments for ElizaOS agents.

entities.name: Drizzle ORM
entities.description: An Object-Relational Mapping library for JavaScript and TypeScript, primarily used with SQL databases. It is facing integration challenges within ElizaOS development.

entities.name: PGlite
entities.description: A lightweight, in-browser SQLite database solution. There's a discussion about whether to keep PGlite or standardize on PostgreSQL within ElizaOS.

entities.name: Dexscreener Plugin
entities.description: A plugin for ElizaOS that provides access to cryptocurrency market data, likely from the Dexscreener platform. It has recently been updated.

entities.name: Farcaster
entities.description: A decentralized social network protocol. ElizaOS plans to implement Farcaster support using webhooks for integration.

entities.name: Neynar
entities.description: A platform or service that provides tools for interacting with the Farcaster protocol, likely offering webhook functionalities for integration.

entities.name: Eli5
entities.description: A community cryptocurrency launched on the Auto.Fun platform, with potential future plans to be developed into an AI agent.

entities.name: Auto.Fun
entities.description: A platform, potentially a launchpad or exchange, where the 'Eli5' cryptocurrency was launched. Shaw, associated with ElizaOS, is involved with this platform.

entities.name: Docker
entities.description: An open-source platform for developing, shipping, and running applications in containers. It is used for setting up local services and deployments for ElizaOS.

entities.name: Podman
entities.description: An open-source container engine for developing, managing, and running OCI Containers. It is mentioned as being supported alongside Docker for ElizaOS.

entities.name: Shaw
entities.description: A key figure in ElizaOS development, involved in outlining the Eliza Cloud roadmap, integrations, and payment systems. Also associated with the Auto.Fun platform.

entities.name: Sam-developer
entities.description: A developer who successfully deployed Eliza Cloud to Railway, including Postgres and Redis, with CI/CD integration.

entities.name: Joshua
entities.description: An agent or developer who created and shared rules for deploying Eliza Cloud to Phala Cloud, including a working example.

entities.name: Vercel AI SDK
entities.description: A software development kit provided by Vercel for integrating AI models into applications. It has a 'system' field for system prompts.

entities.name: Spartan
entities.description: A name associated with a Farcaster integration or bot within ElizaOS. There were discussions about its posting frequency and efficiency.

entities.name: Manus
entities.description: A system mentioned as a comparison for creating autonomous agents that can communicate and collaborate on tasks, similar to the capabilities being explored in ElizaOS.

entities.name: Kimi K2
entities.description: A service or product referred to in the context of a 'flatrate' for stakers, potentially offering an alternative for AI compute.
